info.name: DCI Server API
info.description: Subset of DCI server API calls related to HMAC authentication, identity, create job and upload test results.

item.name: Check if the request is authenticated

request.description: Check if the request is authenticated. Returns 200 = success, or 401 = failure.

response.name: Check if the request is authenticated

item.name: Get a topic id by topic name

request.description:
Get topic id by topic name:

	GET /api/v1/topics?where=name:<topic_name>
    response.data.topic
    {
      id: <topic_id>
    }
    
id: \<topic_id\> in response body should be saved for later use in requests: Get components for a topic and Create a new job

response.name: Get a topic id by topic name

item.name: Change  a job state to pre-run

request.description:
A job can have different states: ['new', 'pre-run', 'running', 'post-run', 'success', 'failure', 'killed', 'error'].
When a job is created its state is 'new'. At the end of a partner remote CI run job_state should be changed to success or failure for the created job.

response.name: Change  a job state to pre-run

item.name: Change  a job state to running

response.name: Change  a job state to running

item.name: Change  a job state to success

request.description:
When a job is created it has a state 'new'. A job can have different states: ['new', 'pre-run', 'running', 'post-run', 'success', 'failure', 'killed', 'error']. At the end of a partner remote CI run job_state should be changed to success or failure for the created job.
    POST /api/v1/jobstates
 Request body:
   {
        'job_id': <job_id>, 
        'status': 'success'
    }

response.name: Change  a job state to success

item.name: Change  a job state to failure

request.description:
A job can have different states: ['new', 'pre-run', 'running', 'post-run', 'success', 'failure', 'killed', 'error'].
When a job is created its state is 'new'. At the end of a partner remote CI run job_state should be changed to success or failure for the created job. POST /api/v1/jobstates Request body: { 'job_id': , 'status': 'failure' }

response.name: Change  a job state to failure
